item.Q:
Write the character:
1: surname
2: high; tall
item.A:
1: Gāo 2: gāo
提高 tígāo raise; increase 提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
(once) again; also; both... and...; again
item.A: yòu

item.Q:
Write the character:
maybe; perhaps; might; possibly; or
item.A:
huò
或者 huòzhě or; possibly; maybe; perhaps

lì
力量 lìliang power; force; strength

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: ought
2: surname; to answer; to respond
item.A:
traditional: 應
1: yīng 2: yìng
应该 (應該) yīnggāi ought to; should; must 反应 (反應) fǎnyìng to react; to respond; reaction; response; reply; chemical reaction

nǚ
妇女 (婦女) fùnǚ woman

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: kind
2: to plant; to cultivate
item.A:
traditional: 種
1: zhǒng 2: zhòng
这种 (這種) zhèzhǒng this; this kind of; this sort of; this type of 种植 (種植) zhòngzhí plant; grow

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: religion; teaching
2: teach
item.A:
1: jiào 2: jiāo
教育 jiàoyù to educate; to teach; education 说教 (說教) shuōjiāo moralism
